======================================================================================================================
FAQ / PERGUNTAS FREQUENTES
======================================================================================================================
Widescreen resolution â€¢ Link[edit]



Set resolution[2]1. Navigate to <path-to-game>system
2. Open XIII.ini with a text editor.
3. Change FullscreenViewportX=800 and FullscreenViewportY=600 to your desired resolution.
4. Save your changes.
 
======================================================================================================================
Field of view (FOV) â€¢ Link[edit]

 This requires you to start a new profile.


Set field of view1. Navigate to <path-to-game>system
2. Open DefUser.ini with a text editor.
3. Change DesiredFOV=85.000000 and DefaultFOV=85.000000 to your desired FOV.
4. Save your changes
